titles.title: To exclude from Federal taxation any portion of any reward paid to David R. Kaczynski and Linda E. Patrik which is donated to the victims in the Unabomber case or their families or which is used to pay Mr. Kaczynski's and Ms. Patrik's attorneys' fees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Exempts from Federal taxation any portions of amounts paid to David R. Kaczynski of Schenectady, New York, and his wife, Linda E. Patrik, for information leading to the arrest of Theodore J. Kaczynski in the "Unabomber" case which are used to: (1) pay attorney's fees in connection with the "Unabomber case"; or (2) benefit "Unabomber" victims and their families. Exempts from Federal taxation all such payments received by such victims and their families.
